{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=XAV1601 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} ''Powerline AV+ 200 Nano with PassThru'' XAVB1601 is a set of two adapters. [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/powerline-and-coax/work-and-play/xavb1601.aspx Product Page]
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=XAV1601}}
[http://kb.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/22054 FAQ] [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s731728 NETGEAR Selects Broadcom's HomePlug AV Technology] - This claims that the XAV1601 uses a Broadcom BCM60321. The ''Firmware Upgrade Utility Version 0.2.0.9'' released by Netgear contains Atheros INT6400 firmware.
